snippet: In his new book, the political journalist and columnist Thomas Byrne Edsall argues that fierce partisanship is here to stay in a battle over shrinking resources.
abstract: Michiko Kakutani reviews book The Age of Austerity: How Scarcity Will Remake American Politics by Thomas Byrne Edsall.
lead_paragraph: In his new book, the political journalist and columnist Thomas Byrne Edsall argues that fierce partisanship is here to stay in a battle over shrinking resources.

headline.seo: Thomas Byrne Edsall’s ‘Age of Austerity’ Interprets Politics
headline.main: Hunger Pangs as Nation’s Pie Shrinks
headline.print_headline: Hunger Pangs As Nation’s Pie Shrinks
